column4: ------ there was a trafic accident at 11.00 pm on the night of August 7
column6: Phnom Penh.------A suspected drunk driver (possibly Chinese) in a Corolla with license plate number 2O-2948 crashed into a divider and overturned
column7: causing serious injury to the driver
column8: who was sent to hospital.------No other vehicles were involved.
